## Learning Objectives

By the end of this class, you will be able to:

- identify random variables with a binomial distribution.
- identify random variables with a geometric distribution.
- calculate expected value and variance of variables with a binomial distribution.
- calculate expected value and variance of variables with a geometric distribution.
